posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
Looking for a nice dex build with a naked AC of 38

Possible??

David

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Yes, it is possible.

I looked through my builds folder and found 5 that look like they might be what you are looking for. I didn't want to flood you with all 5 builds, so please list for me which ones of of them that you would like me to post, even if it is all 5. Here they are in alphabetical order:

1) Nimble Fist - Monk 25 / Fighter 10 / Shadowdancer 5
- This unarmed Monk has only 37 naked AC, but has Epic Dodge, Uncanny Dodge to protect the DEX AC, and a good-for-a-Monk 42 AB.

2) Order of the Bone - Monk 25 / Wizard 3 / Pale Master 12
- This kama Monk has a really good 44 naked AC, but neither Epic Dodge nor Uncanny Dodge and a low 39 AB.

3) Order of the Wyrm - Monk 25 / Sorcerer 1 / Red Dragon Disciple 14
- This kama Monk has a good 42 naked AC and unusual 22 STR on a DEX build, but neither Epic Dodge nor Uncanny Dodge, and a low 39 AB.

4) Unarmed Monk Yardstick - Monk 40
- This unarmed monk has 40 naked AC, 41 AB, and Self Concealment 5, but neither Epic Dodge nor Uncanny Dodge.

5) Untouchable Monk -Rogue 19 / Monk 11 / Fighter 10
- This unarmed Monk has only 35 naked AC, but both Epic Dodge and Self Concealment 5, and Uncanny Dodge, and 42 AB.

EDIT: Oops! I just noticed the title of the thread. I'm sorry that none of these have Barbarian.

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
I like
Untouchable Monk
Nimble Fist
Build does not have to have barbarian. Just needs dodge uncanny dodge and epic dodge

Thank you

David

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: A note about the Untouchable Monk: because he is a Halfling, his unarmed damage will be only 2d6, rather than 1d20, but he does have Epic Weapon Specialization to help.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
KidMiracleman wrote:not that I can think of. Except I would like expertise and improved expertise. How important are
Luck of Heroes and Strong Soul??
Luck of Heroes boosts all your saves by +1, and Strong Soul boosts your Will and Fortitude save by +1 as well as a +1 bonus against death. Without them, your saves go from Fortitude/Will/Reflex 27/24/34 to 25/22/33. I think you could live with that, but Expertise requires a minimum INT of 13.
KidMiracleman wrote:What do you think of these stats??

STR 12
DEX 16 (30)
CON 14
INT 14
WIS 14
CHA 6
You are trying to start with 6 CHA, but a Human can't have any ability start with less than 8 points.

The lower STR means less loot-carrying capacity and 1 less damage. The lower DEX means -1 on Reflex saves (not a big problem in this build), -1 AC and -1 AB. It also means you can't get Epic Dodge at level 27 because your DEX will not be high enough yet.

The +1 Fortitude saves, +40 health, +3 Will saves, +2 AC, and +43 skill points are nice, maybe nice enough to be worth while losing the DEX and STR, but you'll have to give up 2 points of those increases because you can't take 2 from CHA.

I have a counter proposal that will split the difference (17 DEX), but it will require enough shuffling things around to be worth while editing the build for you, but I don't have time to do it right now. I'll get back to you later, probably after midnight my time.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Here it is. This gives you Expertise, Improved Expertise, and full stealth skills. You lose 1 damage and 1 AB, but your AC comes out the same as before. You lose 2 on your Fortitude saves and 2 on your Reflex saves, but your Will saves come out the same.

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
Thank you. Will it make much of a difference if the subrace that I use gets weapon spec unarmed
and epic weapon specialization unarmed free at the beginning of creation. With that in mind what would you take
instead of those feats? Would 6 more levels of fighter make a difference??

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
It makes a difference, but not as big as you might think. It is actually a reason to take less Fighter, but only 2 levels. With these changes, you get +1 to all saves from Luck of Heroes and +2 to your Spell Resistance, making it 37. You gain another 10% Monk speed and +4 skill points, but -4 health.

Nimble Fist 4:


Spoiler

[+]

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
I forgot about SR. I probably should have told you that this subrace gets a base 5 SR and +2 per level.
It also get +3 wisdom at creation and a -4 to CHA. Did not think that would make a difference

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content: I did some experimenting with more fighter. It really did not help. Now all I have to do is come up with a cool name
